title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 205: Featuring Mike Richards
description:
On Monday's episode, the guys are joined by two-time Stanley Cup winner Mike Richards for a great interview. Mike joins to talk about his time in Philadelphia and the Dry Island, some funny Olympics stories and then obviously the two Stanley Cups he won. The guys the break down some recent NHL news then begin their Pacific Division preview. The guys wrap up with the return of RA's Gambling Corner and with the interesting question, what are the best porn star names in hockey?


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
